Creator: Wartime Information Board, Ottawa, for Department of Munitions and Supply.
Description: 61 x 91 cm. Color. Canadian poster encouraging citizens to donate better quality of scrap materials than what can be found in the scrap heap. Graphic shows a gear wheel following a track.
Digitization: Original items were scanned as 600 dpi tiffs on a Zeutschel OS 14000 A0-LS scanner. They were converted to jpegs (sized at 3000 pixels on the long dimension) using Adobe Photoshop CS2 they and subsequently uploaded into CONTENTdm.
Publisher: Issued by Wartime Information Board, Ottawa, for Department of Munitions and Supply. Printed in Canada.
Rights Notes: No known copyright. Item is believed to be in public domain due to failure to comply with required formalities.
Source: From: It's Got To Fit... To Do Its Bit!
Subject: World War, 1939-1945; War Posters, Canadian
Title: It's Got To Fit... To Do Its Bit!
